introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: blipee OS ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our retail analytics platform and related services (collectively, the "Service").
introduction.compliance: We comply with applicable data protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for European Union residents and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) for California residents.

analytics.title: 2.3 Retail Analytics Data
analytics.description: Our platform processes anonymized customer traffic data from your retail locations. This includes:
items: Dwell time and heat map data
analytics.important: Important: We do not collect or store personally identifiable information about your customers. All analytics data is anonymized and aggregated.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We use the information we collect to:
items: Process transactions and send billing information
Detect and prevent fraud or security issues

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

items.title: Service Providers:
items.text: With trusted third parties who assist in operating our platform

items.title: Legal Requirements:
items.text: When required by law or to protect our rights

items.title: Business Transfers:
items.text: In connection with a merger or acquisition

items.title: With Your Consent:
items.text: When you explicitly agree to sharing

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
items: 256-bit SSL encryption for all data in transit
Encryption at rest for sensitive data
Regular security audits and penetration testing

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations:

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.title: Access:
items.text: Request a copy of your personal data

items.title: Portability:
items.text: Receive your data in a portable format

items.title: Object:
items.text: Opt out of certain processing activities

items.title: Restrict:
items.text: Limit how we use your data

ccpa.title: 7.2 CCPA Rights (California Residents)
items: Know what personal information we collect
Opt out of the sale of personal information (we don't sell data)

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect platform functionality.

international.title: 9. International Data Transfers
international.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place:
items: Standard Contractual Clauses for EU data transfers

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.description: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer:
